title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Terms which are
used in this Part and which are defined in section
2590-a
of the

Education Law shall have the same respective meanings as those terms have under
section 2590-a. (b) As used in this

Part, appeal board shall mean the panel of three members of the city board
designated by the chairman or president thereof pursuant to section
113.19
of this Part to consider and
determine an appeal or, if no panel has been designated, the city
board. (c) As used in this Part, the term filing means delivery, personally or by mail, to the secretary of the
city board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
113.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
